body.name: MRS. MEYER'S CLEAN DAY Liquid Laundry Detergent, Biodegradable Formula Infused with Essential Oils, Lemon Verbena, 64 oz (64 Loads)

byLineInfo.name: Visit the MRS. MEYER'S CLEAN DAY Store

features: Concentrated detergent formula is effective yet gentle on clothes
Contains plant-derived cleaning agents with dirt, stain-fighting enzymes, and other thoughtfully chosen ingredients
Biodegradable formula, HE laundry detergent for use in high efficiency and conventional washing machines
Garden-inspired Lemon Verbena scented laundry soap with a light, refreshingly mild citrus fragrance
Mrs. Meyer's products are made with cruelty-free formulas and are Leaping Bunny certified
body.description: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day HE laundry detergent features hardworking yet gentle cleaning agents, while also providing a special, singular scent for your home. Our Lemon Verbena scented washing detergent has a light, refreshingly mild citrus fragrance. This tender herb blossoms in early summer and smells bright and new through and through. Effective yet gentle on clothes, our concentrated laundry soap really packs a punch when it comes to removing dirt and grime. Contains surfactants from plant-derived sources, dirt and stain-fighting enzymes, essential oils, other thoughtfully chosen ingredients and, of course, are always made with a cruelty-free formula. This biodegradable formula liquid detergent is HE compatible. Concentrated for 64 loads of laundry. Also available in other garden-inspired scents and products such as body lotions, liquid hand soaps, candles, and so much more! Mrs. Meyer's - Rooted in Goodness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Making The World a More Greener Place One Garden At A Time Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day products are inspired by the garden, which is why we’re inspired to plant flowers, plants and trees. At Mrs. Meyer’s, we have a passion for the environment. We also know the importance of being a good neighbor in our home, our community and our world. That’s why we’ve made a commitment to improving the earth one flower, plant and tree at a time through our campaigns, partnerships, volunteering efforts and donations.

reviews.reviewText: I've been searching for a non-toxic detergent. This one isn't perfectly nontoxic, but it's great for me. It smells nice and cleans my clothes well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mrs Myers laundry Detergent
reviews.reviewText: Oh I have been using this for years & the dishwashing liquid! Lemon verbena, and lavender are my fav!Highly concentrated, uses botanicals for scent, and biodegradable, this is why I like it.Love it for handwashing items as well.Gets my clothes clean, with a non chemical scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2017
reviews.reviewText: 6-27-17I finally received the Lemon Verbena scented detergent yesterday. It took a bit longer because I added it to my 'Subscribe & Save' order, I wanted to take advantage of the cheaper price doing so.I washed all my sheets, pillows (9), quilts (2), and a regular load of clothes with it so far. I did about 5 loads with it so far. So scent going into the wash is comparable to the "All Surface Meyer's Cleaner"... I love it. Coming out, it becomes more subtle. It still somewhat smells like the cleaner, but oddly enough -to me- it smells even more like a fresh, clean, newborn child. Being a mother, this is the scent that resonates with me more. The sheets and bed items I washed were my own. The scent was so pleasing... taking me back to when my daughter was an infant, the scent was soothing to sleep with. I'll have to post an update with how long it lasts. As far as the regular load I did, there were greased covered garments in it. They seem to have come out quite well... I still have the really heavy grease stains, which I expected. They'll never come out in any detergent, but the greasiness and stench are completely gone, which is what I look for.To those who don't know what the Lemon Verbena cleaner smells like, I'll try to express how I think it smells. It's not lemony as one would expect because of the name... this is an herb, which in fresh picking smells lemon-like... sort of like Lemongrass. Although when used in the products, or at least the cleaner, it has a fresh, invigorating, herbal scent. It just makes me happy to smell it. lol Almost like an odd side effect of an essential oil, such as how lavender has more of a calming effect. But like I mentioned above, the scent is more subtle in the detergent, especially after washing & drying.I like it and will be ordering more in the future. I should add that a little goes a long way, and even more so in a front loader. One 64oz bottle should last 64 loads according to the label and the cap measurement. I, however, used slightly less... to just below the ridge of the cup/cap. Front loader washers don't NEED as much soap, so this could easily last up to 70 loads. I added the full amount when it came to the greasy, grimy, regular load though.As far as the Bluebell scent... I love this scent even more. I think I'll use this more for the clothes and the Lemon Verbena for the sheets, pillows, & maybe towels just because of how the scents resonate with me. They both clean very well. Everything comes out looking & feeling clean. I'm glad I picked these up. The products have certainly won me over.I bought this from the seller "Amazon.com LLC", which I feel is important to list this info. I've come across sellers with variances in their items, including knockoffs, even if listed as same brand. I'll post an update with what I find on longterm use.

reviews.reviewText: Not a fan of the scent but used worse. Scent is obviously personal. Would not buy again in this scent. May try another scent next time.
